General.Name: Leef Brands Inc.
General.Description: Leef Brands Inc. operates as a cannabis branded products manufacturer in the United States. It provides resins and infused pre-rolls. The company offers its products under the Ganja Gold, Real Deal Resin, Heady, and LEEF brand names. The company was formerly known as Icanic Brands Company Inc. and changed its name to Leef Brands Inc. in December 2022. Leef Brands Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
